downloadTitle: Microsoft IT Enterprise Search Topology Using FAST Search Server 2010 for SharePoint
downloadDescription: This download is a Microsoft Visio drawing that shows the logical and physical topology of the enterprise search farm for the Microsoft intranet.
detailsSection: This Microsoft Visio drawing shows the logical and physical topology of the enterprise search farm for the Microsoft intranet, including servers running SharePoint Server 2010, servers running SQL Server 2008, and the rows and columns of servers running FAST Search Server 2010 for SharePoint.
installInstructionSection:
1. Click the Download button in the upper right corner of this page to start the download.
  2. Click Save or Save this program to disk.
  3. Find the file on your hard disk and double-click it to open it.
